name: Soil Share, INC.
description:
Dear New Employee,

Welcome to “Soil Share” and the exciting world of food transformation!  You will become a valuable member of the Soil redistribution community and receive on the job training for how to collect, prepare and distribute an ideal product to the consumer! 
Best,

Soil Share, INC.

Game created by Amy Flaherty with the Tech Valley Game space(http://www.techvalleygamespace.com/discord)!

I took the photos along the trails of the Pine Bush Nature Preserve in Albany,NY

This is a game made for the Ludem Dare 48 Game Jam!  The Theme was "Deeper and Deeper".  I created a  visual novel that explores a dystopian future where dirt can be turned into food.  The player works for the company that collects soil samples.  I wanted to explore the themes of labor, corporate greed, food insecurity and environmentalism as well.  

Future builds will include more interactivity, sound and music.

MUSIC

"Statis" by TrackTribe from the YouTube Audio Library

"Torture" by Coyote Hearing from the YouTube Audio Library

This game contains mature themes.
